page.title: 08Stanton-u-Bardon Shop
page.content: We interviewed Mr.Murvey manager of Cresent Foodstores Ltd,he told us that,in addition to the{Village shop, he has two{Mobile Shops}with a van driver for each one.He first started using Mobile Shops about twelve years ago.They visit five different places in Leicestershire,and have about five hundred customers a week. In the Mobile shops Mr.Murvey sells {meat,groceries and vegetables.}He spends most of his time working in the Mobile Shops. Cresent Foodstores are situated in the Main Street, and are{butcher}and {newsagent}to the village but also sell sweets, fruit and groceries.Meat and Newspapers are the most popular products sold there.
